info.title: Kanbanize
info.description: The Kanbanize connector allows you to create, update or move cards inside your Kanban boards, as well as to retrieve information about your boards and their structure. Other supported functions are adding comments or logging time on the cards.

post.description: Move a card (Task or Initiative, if possible) to a column.

parameters.name: HTTP_KANBANIZE_INTEGRATION
parameters.description: specifies where this request comes from

parameters.name: HTTP_KANBANIZE_INTEGRATION
parameters.description: specifies where this request comes from

post.description: Log time to a card. The time is logged in minutes.

400.description: The request failed due to a client error.

403.description: You do not have the permissions required to access this resource or to perform this action.

429.description: This request will not be processed because you have sent too many requests recently.

500.description: The request failed due to an internal server error.

post.description: Block, unblock or edit block reasons for a card.
Move card to archive. The card must be not be blocked and it must be in column Done or in column Archive.

history.description: Set to yes if you want to get history for the task
history.title: Get History

comments.description: Set to yes if you want to get comments for the task
comments.title: Get comments

textformat.description: If 'plain' text format is used, HTML tags are stripped from the task description
textformat.title: Text Format

post.description: Get all cards from a given board.

get.description: Get all workflows from a given board.

post.description: Triggers for any action on the board. Use Control/Condition or Control/Switch to manage flow for different triggers. Here is partial list of supported event types: "Card created", "Card moved", "Card details changed", "Card deleted", "Card blocked"
